pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 2, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Canadian National Prayer Breakfast. Minister of Seniors Filomena Tassi will be in attendance.

International Ballroom
Delta Hotels Ottawa City Centre
101 Lyon Street North

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:00 a.m.

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the opening plenary of the Canada Youth Summit, and observe a breakout session on the youth digital experience.

Residence Commons
Carleton University
1125 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Premier of Alberta Jason Kenney.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Canada Youth Summit delegatesâ€™ volunteer service with Operation Come Home.

Operation Come Home
150 Gloucester Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:15 p.m.

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Canada Youth Summit evening reception.

Closed to media.
